about.subtitle: About The Agency
about.heading: A YOUNG REALITY FOCUSED ON QUALITY
about.paragraph1: Ethics, professionalism and attention to the client are the pillars on which we build our work. A team of young and passionate professionals who will follow you constantly, attentively and effectively. We listen to your needs and, together, we find the solution that best reflects your expectations.
about.paragraph2: Empathy and dedication are our qualities, which form the basis for a constant and lasting relationship of trust.
about.heroTitle: Trusted partner for Italian and international clients

services.subtitle: Our Services
services.heading: REAL ESTATE BROKERAGE AND MORE
services.paragraph1: Our goal is to offer a quality service that guarantees complete customer satisfaction. In an evolving market, we listen to your needs and guide you with professionalism at every stage, from finding the ideal home to managing negotiations.
services.paragraph2: Transparency, communication and empathy are at the heart of our work: we want you to feel informed and supported in every decision. Our passion for real estate drives us to maintain high standards and build lasting relationships of trust.
services.propertyHuntingDesc: Our goal is to offer a quality service that guarantees complete customer satisfaction. In an evolving market, we listen to your needs and guide you with professionalism at every stage, from finding the ideal home to managing negotiations.
services.propertyValuationsDesc: We offer accurate and professional property valuations to help you determine the real value of your property. Our team of experts analyzes the local market, property characteristics and current trends to provide you with a precise and reliable estimate.
services.photographyServiceDesc: A professional photography service is essential to enhance your property. Our expert photographers capture every detail and angle of the home, creating high-quality images that highlight the unique features of the property and attract potential buyers.
services.realEstateConsultancyDesc: From the initial meeting to the notarial deed, we accompany you at every stage of the real estate process. We offer comprehensive consultations in Italian, English and German, guaranteeing professional and transparent support for international and local clients.
services.afterSalesAssistanceDesc: Our commitment does not end with the sale. We offer complete after-sales assistance, including moving management, maintenance and inspection of the new home. We are always available to support you even after the deal is concluded.

contact.heading: GARDABLICK
contact.description: Your next chapter starts here. Are you ready to find your dream home or make a successful real estate investment? Our team of experts is here to listen to your needs and guide you towards the perfect solution. Don't hesitate to contact us for a personalized and no-obligation consultation. Together, we will turn your real estate goals into reality.
contact.phoneHint: Enter a complete phone number with international prefix. E.g: +39 123 4567890
contact.privacyConsent: I declare that I have read and understood the
contact.updatesConsent: and wish to receive updates and offers from them.

vendi.introHeading: SELL YOUR HOME EFFECTIVELY AND TRANSPARENTLY
vendi.introDescription: Every property has a unique story. Our job is to maximize its value. We analyze every detail of your property and provide you with a precise and personalized valuation, completely free and without any obligation. From here starts a clear, guided path built just for you.
vendi.formDescription: Fill out the form to request a free valuation of your property. Our team will contact you as soon as possible.
vendi.messagePlaceholder: Describe your property or your needs
vendi.updatesConsent: Yes, I wish to receive updates and offers
vendi.service1Desc: We evaluate your property with an in-depth analysis of the local market, property characteristics and current trends to determine the optimal selling price.
vendi.service2Desc: We develop a tailor-made sales strategy for your property, considering your needs and sales objectives to maximize results.
vendi.service3Desc: We create high-quality promotional materials, including professional photography, video tours and detailed descriptions to enhance your property.
vendi.service4Desc: We manage all potential buyer contacts, organize guided tours and keep you updated on every interest shown in your property.
vendi.service5Desc: We accompany you until the signing of the notarial deed, managing all necessary documentation and guaranteeing a safe and transparent sale.

cookie.title: This website uses cookies
cookie.description: We use cookies to personalize content and ads, to provide social media features and to analyze our traffic. We also share information about the way you use our site with our partners who deal with web data analysis, advertising and social media, who may combine it with other information that you have provided to them or that they have collected from your use of their services.
cookie.necessaryDesc: Necessary cookies: Help make a website usable by enabling basic functions like page navigation and access to secure areas.
cookie.preferenceDesc: Preference cookies: Enable the website to remember information that changes the way the website behaves or looks, like your preferred language or the region you are in.
cookie.statisticsDesc: Statistics cookies: Help website owners understand how visitors interact with websites by collecting and reporting information anonymously.
cookie.marketingDesc: Marketing cookies: Used to track visitors across websites to display relevant and engaging ads.
cookie.infoDesc1: Cookies are small text files that can be used by websites to make the user experience more efficient.
cookie.infoDesc2: The law states that we can store cookies on your device if they are strictly necessary for the operation of this site. For all other types of cookies we need your permission. This site uses different types of cookies. Some cookies are placed by third-party services that appear on our pages.
